targets.expr: topk(20, max by(uri, method, status) (max_over_time({job="nginx"} | json | unwrap request_time [$__range])))
topk(10, avg by(uri) (avg_over_time({job="nginx"} | json | unwrap request_time [1m])))

panels.title: Top 10 Slowest Endpoints - Response Time Trend

targets.expr: topk(10, avg by(uri) (avg_over_time({job="nginx"} | json | unwrap request_time [$__range])))

{job="nginx"} | json | uri =~ "$uri_filter" | status =~ "$status_filter" | method =~ "$method_filter" | line_format "[{{.ts}}] {{.method}} {{.uri}} - Status: {{.status}} - Time: {{.request_time}}s - IP: {{.remote_ip}}"
